565450.name: Fantasy Grounds - Deadlands Reloaded: OneSheet Adventure PAK (Savage Worlds)
565450.description:
7 Quick Adventure Modules for the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop
PDF versions of this are available for free here:
Each of these adventures has been converted for use with Fantasy Grounds. They can be used in existing campaigns or as ideas for your own adventures.
This PAK contains each of the following adventures
  • Buffalo Soldiers
  • Daddy's Boy
  • Deep Dark Woods
  • Feast of Famine
  • Lover's Quarrel
  • Lynched
  • Scare Crow
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Kevin Doswell

Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
